scripts.dump: docker exec tonbly_postgres_1 pg_dump -U postgres -d postgres --column-inserts --data-only $(docker exec tonbly_postgres_1 psql -q -A -t -U postgres -c "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'public' ORDER BY table_schema, table_name" | sed -e 's/^/-t /' | sed 's/$/ /' | tr -d '\n') | sed -n -e '/^INSERT INTO public/p' >> dump.sql
